original_title: Ο Κυρ Γιώργης Και Οι Τρέλλες Του
overview: The heirs of two Cypriot winemakers and sworn rivals visit incognito the city of Paphos to flee from two arranged marriages of convenience, only to meet and fall in love. Is this a star-crossed affair in the likes of Romeo and Juliet?
title: Vacation to Our Cyprus
